sections.general: patient advocate career overview skilled medical assistant with the sound knowledge of technical support, medical duties and clerical skills. excellent communication skills along with very solid customer service knowledge. core strengths active listening skills energetic work attitude strong organizational skills patient charting healthcare billing proficiency health insurance processing clinical training insurance eligibility verification medical assisting specialist medical billing computerized charting specialist high customer service standards cpr/bls certified conflict resolution proficiency medical coding capability proficient with microsoft office suite talent in obtaining/charting vital signs microsoft word, excel, powerpoint patient positioning understanding detail oriented qualified in specimen collection/processing planning/coordinating microsoft office excellent quantitative skills spreadsheet development insurance processing accomplishments honor roll recipient osha compliance â properly disposed of daily biohazard waste in compliance with federal and local regulations. customer interface â greeted customers upon entrance and handled all cash and credit transactions. assisted customers over the phone regarding store operations, product, promotions and orders. clinical skills â monitored patient's respiration activity, blood pressure and blood glucose levels in response to medical administration.
